# Descriptive statistics - `r params$country`

```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
df = clean_dataset
```

```{r}
df %>%
  select(category, bcc, ccc, valence, arousal, anger, compassion, hope) %>%
  tbl_summary(
    by = category,
    statistic = list(
      all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
      all_categorical() ~ "{n} ({p}%)"
    ),
    digits = all_continuous() ~ 2,
    missing_text = "(Missing)"
  )
```
